price: 5. (Noé) invocó (a su Señor) diciendo: “¡Señor!, he llamado a mi pueblo a la fe noche y día.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
